    • Uses of GradientUpdater in org.nd4j.linalg.learning

      Classes in org.nd4j.linalg.learning that implement GradientUpdater 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdaDeltaUpdater
      http://www.matthewzeiler.com/pubs/googleTR2012/googleTR2012.pdf https://arxiv.org/pdf/1212.5701v1.pdf Ada delta updater.
      class  AdaGradUpdater
      Vectorized Learning Rate used per Connection Weight

      Adapted from: http://xcorr.net/2014/01/23/adagrad-eliminating-learning-rates-in-stochastic-gradient-descent/ See also http://cs231n.github.io/neural-networks-3/#ada
      class  AdaMaxUpdater
      The AdaMax updater, a variant of Adam.
      class  AdamUpdater
      The Adam updater.
      class  AMSGradUpdater
      The AMSGrad updater
      Reference: On the Convergence of Adam and Beyond - https://openreview.net/forum?
      class  NadamUpdater
      The Nadam updater.
      class  NesterovsUpdater
      Nesterov's momentum.
      class  NoOpUpdater
      NoOp updater: gradient updater that makes no changes to the gradient
      class  RmsPropUpdater
      RMS Prop updates: http://www.cs.toronto.edu/~tijmen/csc321/slides/lecture_slides_lec6.pdf http://cs231n.github.io/neural-networks-3/#ada
      class  SgdUpdater
      SGD updater applies a learning rate only
